projects.title: Wireless Industrial Monitoring System
projects.description: â€˜Data Information Knowledgeâ€™ monitoring system comprising of Atmega 16 microcontroller programmed with WinAVR; Zigbee module, GSM module, temperature and humidity sensors. Implementation of GUI with Visual Basic programming. Presented at the Prakalpa 2013 project exhibition event at KJSCE. Field study conducted at Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilizers Limited where the group members analysed the model of the data acquisition system used in the plant and its various aspects. A research grant was received from the college for the above project.Project role: Programming of ATMega16 microcontroller. PCB design using Proteus 7.6., System prototyping and testing.
